availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Newton Dean and Susan Philips Dean. Resident of Mercer County, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Frankfort, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the U.S. Army for six months before discharge due to illness.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer, District 2, p. 312A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin, Frankfort, p. 278. KYR-0001-029-0297.
